website_summaries.verdict: This early edition HP Server still gets things right, including the price.
pros: Powerful machine that's sturdy, built to last, and works great for any type of server needs
Adequate memory, fast, and reliable hardware
cons: It's big and the busy fan is rather loud
Even with the fan, users may run into temperature issues

customer_reviews.title: I was and still am very happy with this purchase months later
customer_reviews.text: This unit was probably more than I needed. I have this running a few online game servers, some light web hosting, and a teamspeak server with minimal resource usage. I was and still am very happy with this purchase months later. The unit can be a bit loud on a hot day if the fans really kick in it's a bit much but I have it in my bedroom. If it were in another room I don't think this would be an issue at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Burke

customer_reviews.title: It is a little on the noisy side but it's running great! I am currently running VMware ESXi 6
customer_reviews.text: So I been running the server for about two weeks now. It is a little on the noisy side but it's running great! I am currently running VMware ESXi 6.5 with 7 Windows 8 VM. It's running a bit slow with 7 Windows VM running but at one point I had 15 Linux Lubuntu VMs with no issues. I will be purchasing higher RAMs in the near future just to accommodate the my 7 Windows. I will definitely be purchasing another one! Customer service was great too. I had a question and they quickly answered it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Delgado

customer_reviews.title: got Windows Server 2012 R2 running on it right away and I couldn't be happier. Great product
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited to get this as my first home rack server, got Windows Server 2012 R2 running on it right away and I couldn't be happier. Great product, only issue is one of the drives and one of the power supplies I got didn't work and I tried getting to their support line and have had no luck yet, but great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. But be warned: this unit ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. But be warned: this unit is far deeper than it looks in the picture: 28 inches. And heavy! Successfully installed Ubuntu Server 14.10. CentOS will not install (doesn't have hard drive controllers that work).
customer_reviews.author: William Zeitler

customer_reviews.title: My server came with 1 bad hard disk and with a single phone call
customer_reviews.text: My server came with 1 bad hard disk and with a single phone call, they had a replacement drive sent out to me right away! Very pleased with this product. I've been using this server for months now with 0 issues. A+
customer_reviews.author: Justin Oros

customer_reviews.title: Best server for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying and recommending these used servers for a couple years now. It's like pennies on the dollar for low cost redundant servers that work great. Get four for the price of one. Great deal. Great performance. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: A little loud and yes it's big. But it works great. I run a NUUO camera server with 16 IP cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: awesome cheap server
customer_reviews.text: Fast with decent memory and up to 6 drives, this server is great and replaced 3 servers on the rack. The dual ps are great as well plugged into multiple battery backups for redundancy. I'd recommend this server. Due to being a rack mount, it is a tad loud but no louder than the other Dell's or HPs I already have.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Well built and lots of bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: Have run VMware, Citrix, Windows Server 2008 and linux so far. This machine has been nothing but great for such an excellent price. No hardware or heat issues so far and not to unreasonable on the sound. Plan on buying a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Last ~ a month
customer_reviews.text: Almost a month after I got it I have issues were it failed to boot due to over temp issues. Resat processor, reapplied thermal checked fans etc...no luck... When it was working though it worked great and if it didn't break down on me so fast I would say excellent product for the price but...
customer_reviews.author: Joshua T Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great server. great price. exactly what i needed and does the job perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: mark manning

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for an older server great for testing and development, arrived with one dead drive shipped out a replacement, got it in 2 days
customer_reviews.author: RJDH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good Deal ... had to add stuff to it but worked out good
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Hedrick

customer_reviews.title: Building a VMware lab
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and works better than expected. Now, I can build my own lab. Thanks, Dennis Huggins
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Huggins

customer_reviews.title: The server is a powerful server of its kind and at that price of $200 the best you can get
customer_reviews.text: Loaded with 16GB ram and Remote KVM and ILO2. The server is a powerful server of its kind and at that price of $200 the best you can get.
customer_reviews.author: Pronine Canada

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Originally thought I would use as a home server, but oh MY I forgot how LOUD it is.
customer_reviews.author: Mdlthomas

customer_reviews.title: works great as a minecraft server cons
customer_reviews.text: pros: works great as a minecraft server cons: i couldnt afford 2
customer_reviews.author: Billy T

customer_reviews.title: The server came on time and was packed well. ...
customer_reviews.text: The server came on time and was packed well. The only issue was the status board that pops out doesn't "click-lock" every time, but being a used server, I had no problems with that. It even came with a battery backup write cache! Overall, you can't beat this deal.
customer_reviews.author: Schabaz

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was fast
customer_reviews.text: The server is awesome is very silence. I installed Ubuntu server, running smooth..
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Bracho

customer_reviews.title: Cant go wrong with it.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a test lab server. It might look small but dont be fooled, it is over 2 feet long and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: BrinVlogs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product have not failed me so far. Planning on purchasing another one or two more.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Proliant G5
customer_reviews.text: This is a great price for a piece of equipment that will serve as a home media server. I am very pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Rod Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Great Server at a great price,  Very helpful staff
customer_reviews.text: When I received the Server I was not able to load the OS on it because the company forgot to delete the logical partitions. I contacted them before I knew what was wrong and they got back to me right away after hours and assisted me first thing in the morning and we got it working. Thank you for your help. This is a great server at a great price. I'm running Ubuntu Server on it and currently have 4 virtual servers setup and running simultaneously. A file server, 2 Web servers, and a minecraft server. Thank you again.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This worked amazingly, on start up it scared the crap out of me because how loud the fans really are i would not suggest this in somewhere people would be near all the time it could get annoying
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked out of the box no issues, came with RAM, two CPU's and 2 10k hard drives
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Messano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Had an issue with power supply failure which was promptly replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This has workded beyond what I expected. It is well made and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great old hardware for the price, however came with dead cmos battery
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat this old hardware for the price. However mine arrived with a dead cmos battery which caused issues with settings returning to default (and thus couldn't use ESXi on it). It's not a big deal to replace, but would have bee nice to know up front that it was bad. Would have been 5 stars if not for that. Bottom line, though, I would order another of these if I needed one.
customer_reviews.author: craigmray4

customer_reviews.title: ... tech emailing is METAL and the persons response is pretty
customer_reviews.text: Who ever does there tech emailing is METAL and the persons response is pretty quick
customer_reviews.author: patrick k schichel

product_meta.title: HP Proliant DL360 Gen5 Server with 2x2.5GHz Quad Core Processors and 16GB Memory - - 2x146GB 10K SAS Hard Drives - No OS -
product_meta.description: Meet your database management needs! This HP ProLiant DL360 Generation 5 (G5) 1U Server is powered by a two Intel Xeon L5420 2.5 GHz quad-core processors and 16 GB of DDR2 FB-DIMMs. Two 146 GB 10,000 RPM SAS 2.5-inch hard drives are provided for your storage needs! The DL360 Generation 5 (G5) features ATI ES-1000 32 MB integrated video and two 700-watt power supplies. With two Gigabit Ethernet LAN ports, you'll enjoy high-speed network connectivity. Access to DVD and CD media with the DVD-ROM drive. All you need is to add the operating system, monitor and the rest and you're ready to go! Order your HP ProLiant DL360 G5 1U Server today!
feature_bullets: HP ProLiant G5 Dual Xeon L5420 2.5 GHz 1U Server General Features: No Operating System!
1U rack height form factor Two (2) Intel Xeon L5420 2.5 GHz quad-core processors
1333 MHz FSB speed, 12 MB L2 cache Intel 5000P chipset 16 GB DDR2 FB-DIMM (64 GB maximum)
DVD-ROM drive Two (2) 146 GB 10,000 RPM 2.5-inch SAS hot plug hard drives

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars39 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
